message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $95. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  How about $85? I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.

I appreciate your response, Bob. Let me make you an offer of $90 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a fair deal while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I hope this proposal suits your needs.
Alice,  $90 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go to $87.  Let's meet in the middle and finalize this deal.
